abstract.t: This document defines the "xml2rfc" version 3 vocabulary: an XML- based language used for writing RFCs and Internet-Drafts. When published as an RFC, it will obsolete RFC 7991. Discussion of this document is taking place on the xml2rfc-dev mailing list. See <https://www.ietf.org/mailman/listinfo/xml2rfc-dev> for more information about the mailing list.
